ygData.subject: Re: On general applicability of HyperNEAT and extending the CPPN
ygData.msgSnippet: Jonurena, good questions, here are my thoughts: 1)  The main issue with ES-HyperNEAT is that it is much newer than NEAT so it is less understood.  In principle
